Connektion Com A New Generation Networking Platform For Gaming Enthusiasts And The Tech Savvy

15 Sep 2007

Connekt here to talk about games, internet, life. Forum, Discussion Board, Friends, Profiles, Members. Organise LAN Parties, Make reservations, shop online or plan a gaming marathon at Connekt. Connekt is a fairly new concept with the first store being launched in Jaipur providing the youth a premium tech-lounge experience. A truly premium internet access in a quality cafe setting. Along with hi-speed internet services like Emails, Broadband Surfing, VoIP calling, Internet telephony, Live gaming, Live Chat, LAN Gaming, Lightening fast downloads only to name a few. Add to that some delicious desserts, a warm cup of coffee and an ambience that relaxes and you will find yourself at Connekt. Whether you are interested in an action-packed game of counter-strike or a solo game of chess, whether you are interested in finishing that overdue uni-assignment or just spend some time networking online, Connekt has something for you.
